name: cowboys shootout
description: This following game I have made is about two cowboys shooting  it out to win.  The controls are simple. Player 1 use the letters:  w, a, s, d, q, e  in order to move around. Player 1 use the SPACE BAR to shoot.   Player 2 use the number pad: 8, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9 and use the DOWN arrow to shoot. Experiment with moving around and you'll get the hang of it. Have fun! Oh! One thing, please but lower the volume on your computer. When the game ends press the letter 'c' to play again>
